settings.title: CBd VS CBDª
settings.text:
CBD is a non-intoxicating cannabinoid that is commonly sought after for its potential therapeutic benefits, including pain relief, anxiety reduction, and anti-inflammatory properties.

CBDa is the acidic precursor and rawer form of CBD, providing additional health benefits more active beneficial compounds.

settings.title: The science
settings.text: CBDA is isolated and purified using extraction techniques like solvent extraction or CO2 extraction. It's found in raw cannabis and serves as the acidic precursor to CBD, with heating processes leading to its conversion. Thus, to obtain CBDA specifically, methods avoiding heat during extraction and processing are essential.

settings.title: The benefits
settings.text:
CBDa holds promise as a therapeutic agent with anti-inflammatory, anti-nausea, and potential anti-cancer properties. It may also offer benefits in managing pain and epilepsy.

It presents itself as a valuable compound in natural medicine with various potential health benefits

settings.heading: puresource beverages BLEND
settings.desc: Our PureSource beverages begin with the timeless goodness of fresh tea, a cherished ingredient used for centuries. However, we take it a step further by crafting a formula that is both pure and purposeful. Say goodbye to added sugars – our beverages are meticulously created with absolutely no sugar. Instead, we sweeten them with monkfruit extract, providing natural sweetness without compromising your health. To enhance your relaxation experience, we introduce CBDa, a raw cannabinoid known for its potential therapeutic benefits. This thoughtfully curated formula combines the richness of fresh tea with added nutrients, CBDa, and no sugar, offering a truly revitalizing and health-conscious beverage that stands out in the modern era.
